Dialogue.Page: Mod: The Cosmic Curators Authors: pikpik, Echatsum, Anonymous, Repcon, cOa Rex
The Cosmic Curators is a mod made for the fifth mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community. The mod takes place in a vessel of alien origin in orbit around a pulsar.
This mod is one of two Jam 5 mods to feature a completely new species, and has an array of puzzles for the player to solve and a bunch of new lore to explore.
Perhaps this mod will find itself on the leaderboard?
